newsitem.title: UK: Single April 16-18 Brent cargo kept - trade.
newsitem.headline: Single April 16-18 Brent cargo kept - trade.

text.p: One Brent crude cargo nominated loading dates of April 16-18 was kept ahead of the five o'clock deadline on Tuesday, traders said.
The cargo, brought forward to Tuesday from Wednesday, was kept by BP, they said.
Brent cargoes are traded on a paper, or forward market until the 1700 London time deadline on the nearest trading day 15 days before their assigned loading date.
A trading company is clocked when it is left with a paper cargo which has turned physical after that deadline and therefore cannot be passed on as part of pre-sold paper cargo deals.
